Interface JavaFXChessboardDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaFXEuropeanChessDisplay, JavaFXXiangqiDisplay

    public interface JavaFXChessboardDisplay
    The javaFX display for a chessboard

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • displayEmptySquare

        void displayEmptySquare(javafx.scene.control.Button button,
                        int row,
                        int column)
        Display a square that has no piece on it.
        Parameters:
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board

      • displayFilledSquare

        void displayFilledSquare(javafx.scene.control.Button button,
                         int row,
                         int column,
                         ChessPiece piece)
        Display of a square with a piece on it
        Parameters:
        button - the button to select that square
        row - the row of the square
        column - the column of the square
        piece - the piece that is selected with the button

      • highlightSquare

        void highlightSquare(boolean highlight,
                     javafx.scene.control.Button button,
                     int row,
                     int column,
                     ChessPiece piece)
        higlights the selected squares
        Parameters:
        highlight - is it highlighted or not
        button - the button clicked
        row - the row of the square selected
        column - the column of the square selected
        piece - the piece on the highlighted square
